page.title: 05 AGRICULTURAL SYSTEMS.
page.content: Situated on the outskirts of Welling_ borough,{Grange farm}(915682),is not typical of the area,specializing on pig farming.The neighbouring farms are arable or dairy.It covers an area of 10.5 hectares,8.91 of which are used for growing crops.Wheat is grown for four years followed by oil-seed rape. The soil is light loam and oil-seed is most productive.The farm has 156 breeding sows(each sow has an average of 11piglets),7boars,216 piglets and 1370 feeding pigs.60 are taken weekly to Parkers in Leicester and sold for meat.These cutter pigs are sold at a weight of 82kg.The farm has one tractor and one slurry-tanker.zthree farm workers run the farm.Though the slurry-tanker keeps some buildings clean the older buildings have to be cleaned out by hand.
